quote: The gods of Olympus have abandoned me. Now there is no hope.
author: Kratos

quote: The cycle ends here. We must be better than this.
author: Kratos

quote: Do not be sorry. Be better.
author: Kratos

quote: The greatest weapon in the fight against chaos is order.
author: Kratos

quote: Pain is a reminder that we are finite. Death gives meaning to our lives.
author: Kratos

quote: You cannot change your fate. No man can.
author: Kratos

quote: The gods do not define us. They merely give us purpose.
author: Kratos

quote: Haters are gonna hate, but you gotta keep moving forward.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The greatest battle you'll ever fight is the one within yourself.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk at all.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Success is not about being the best, it's about being better than you were yesterday.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: It's not what you say, it's what you do that matters.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The only way to grow is to step outside your comfort zone.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Don't let fear hold you back. Embrace it, and use it as motivation to succeed.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The only person you should be competing with is yourself.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: It's better to be disliked for who you are than to be liked for who you're not.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Success is not a destination, it's a journey.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: You can't change the past, but you can change the future.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The only limit is the one you set for yourself.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Believe in yourself, even when no one else does.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: I'm not afraid to speak my mind. I'm not afraid to take action. That's what makes me a badass.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going. That's what being a badass is all about.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: I don't care about being politically correct. I care about being correct.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Being a badass means doing what needs to be done, no matter how hard it may be.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: I don't make excuses. I make things happen.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Being a badass is not about being perfect. It's about being real and authentic.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: I'm not here to please everyone. I'm here to achieve my goals and live life on my own terms.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Compare yourself to who you were yesterday, not to who someone else is today.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: It's better to do something badly than to not do it at all.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: Set your house in perfect order before you criticize the world.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: The purpose of life is finding the largest burden that you can bear and bearing it.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: The person you are listening to may know something you don't.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: Treat yourself like someone you are responsible for helping.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: You cannot be protected from the things that frighten you and hurt you, but if you identify with the part of your being that is responsible for transformation, then you are always the equal, or more than the equal of the things that frighten you.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: Gratitude and fear cannot occupy the same space. The more grateful you are, the less fear you have.
author: Andrew Huberman

quote: Suffering comes from trying to avoid difficulty, not from the difficulty itself.
author: Andrew Huberman

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Andrew Huberman

quote: Mastery is not a function of talent, but a function of time and deliberate practice.
author: Andrew Huberman

quote: What's in the way is the way.
author: Andrew Huberman

quote: The key to motivation is to find your purpose and connect with the emotional significance of that purpose.
author: Andrew Huberman

quote: Change your behavior and your feelings will follow.
author: Andrew Huberman

quote: The only way to grow is to suffer.
author: David Goggins

quote: The most important conversation is the one you have with yourself.
author: David Goggins

quote: Nobody is going to come to help you. You've got to save yourself.
author: David Goggins

quote: When you think you're done, you're only at 40% of what your body is capable of doing. That's just the limits that we put on ourselves.
author: David Goggins

quote: The only way to get stronger is to expose yourself to challenges that are greater than what you're used to.
author: David Goggins

quote: You have to build calluses on your brain just like how you build calluses on your hands. Callus your mind through pain and suffering.
author: David Goggins

quote: We are all great. No matter if you think you're dumb, fat, been bullied, we all have greatness. You gotta find the courage. It's going to be hard work, discipline, and the non-cognitive skills - hard work, dedication, sacrifice - that will set you apart.
author: David Goggins

quote: The most important conversations you'll ever have are the ones you'll have with yourself.
author: David Goggins

quote: If you're not getting better, you're getting worse.
author: David Goggins

quote: If you can get through doing things that you hate to do, on the other side is greatness.
author: David Goggins

quote: Most people who doubt you doubt you because they can't do it themselves.
author: David Goggins

quote: I don't stop when I'm tired. I stop when I'm done.
author: David Goggins

quote: The only way to grow stronger is to embrace the pain.
author: David Goggins

quote: The most dangerous person is the one who listens, thinks and observes.
author: David Goggins

quote: It's not necessarily the dreams that are motivating, it's the grind that gets you there.
author: David Goggins

quote: The only thing more contagious than a good attitude is a bad one.
author: David Goggins

quote: The cookie jar is always full. Take a cookie and shut up.
author: David Goggins

quote: It's easier to accept the fact that you're just not good enough. We all have a lot more than we think we have.
author: David Goggins

quote: The most important step a man can take. It's not the first one, is it? It's the next one. Always the next step.
author: David Goggins

quote: Don't let the world make you hard. Don't let pain make you hate. Don't let the bitterness steal your sweetness.
author: David Goggins

quote: The cycle ends here. We must be better than this.
author: Kratos

quote: Don't be sorry. Be better.
author: Kratos

quote: The mark of a warrior. You are marked by the gods. You must be relentless.
author: Mimir

quote: Your progress is impressive. But your skills, your skills will not carry you to the mountain.
author: Mimir

quote: Knowledge is not always what it seems.
author: Mimir

quote: Memories are just moments. We do not always have them in order, nor do we always remember them correctly.
author: Mimir

quote: The past is in your head. The future is in your hands.
author: Kratos

quote: I have taught you nothing.
author: Mimir

quote: You are not defined by your past, but by your actions.
author: Kratos

quote: You must be better than me, Kratos. You must be better than me.
author: Mimir

quote: The gods of Olympus have abandoned me. Now there is no hope.
author: Kratos

quote: The gods are not responsible for your actions, boy.
author: Mimir

quote: To be effective in combat, a warrior must not feel for his enemy.
author: Kratos

quote: We do what we must to end the lives of those who stand against us.
author: Kratos

quote: The gods will not be pleased.
author: Mimir

quote: The mind's eye can be more accurate than any weapon.
author: Mimir

quote: Sometimes, the only way to go forward is to go back.
author: Mimir

quote: The gods do not define us. It is our actions that define us.
author: Kratos

quote: Life is never fair. It is up to you to make the best of it.
author: Kratos

quote: Pain is your ally, it is your meat, it is your cloak. Pain reveals to you the true strength you possess.
author: Kratos

quote: The mind of a warrior is always in a state of preparedness.
author: Kratos

quote: The cycle ends here. We must be better than this.
author: Kratos

quote: The greatest weapon in the fight against doubt is a strong will.
author: Kratos

quote: The reward for facing a problem is the opportunity to solve it.
author: Kratos

quote: Punishment and reward are the lowest forms of education.
author: Mimir

quote: The mind is the best weapon. Everything else is supplemental.
author: Kratos

quote: The only thing that separates us from the animals is our ability to accessorize.
author: Mimir

quote: Believe in yourself, even in the face of adversity.
author: Kratos

quote: Patience is key to mastery. Patience and repetition.
author: Kratos

quote: One cannot achieve perfection without first experiencing failure.
author: Mimir

quote: To be effective in combat, one must be able to adapt to changing circumstances.
author: Kratos

quote: It is not enough to know how to fight. One must know when to fight.
author: Kratos

quote: Our choices define us, far more than our abilities.
author: Mimir

quote: Fear is a liar. It will convince you that you are weak, when in fact you are strong.
author: Kratos

quote: Greatness is not measured by how much one achieves, but by how much one overcomes.
author: Mimir

quote: The key to survival is preparation. Anticipate the unexpected.
author: Kratos

quote: The only thing we can control in life is how we respond to the things we cannot control.

quote: The only thing we can control in life is how we respond to the things we cannot control.

quote: The mind of a strategist, the heart of a warrior.
author: Mimir

quote: A warrior's greatest weapon... is patience.

quote: One's perception of the world is a reflection of one's own mind.
author: Mimir

quote: Puny troll.
author: Kratos

quote: Without the strength to endure, the struggle itself would be meaningless.
author: Kratos

quote: What he did to you was wrong. Staying dead would have been worse.
author: Mimir

quote: One cannot change the past. Only the future.
author: Kratos

quote: The only thing permanent in life is impermanence.
author: Mimir

quote: We are what we fight for.
author: Kratos

quote: The mind is the most powerful weapon you possess.
author: Mimir

quote: Change is often painful, but always necessary.
author: Kratos

quote: Every journey has an end. No matter how long or short it may be.
author: Mimir

quote: No man can escape his own destiny.
author: Kratos

quote: The greatest obstacle in life is the illusion of success.
author: Mimir

quote: A moment of patience in a moment of anger saves you a hundred moments of regret.
author: Kratos

quote: The mind can be a deceptive weapon. Use it wisely.
author: Mimir

quote: The greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Kratos

quote: Fate is inexorable. It cannot be bargained with. It cannot be reasoned with. It will not be swayed by emotion.
author: Mimir

quote: The cycle ends here. We must be better than this.
author: Kratos

quote: Find your way home.
author: Mimir

quote: Pain is a reminder of our own vulnerability.
author: Mimir

quote: Power comes in many forms. It is not just physical.
author: Kratos

quote: One's wealth is defined by what they've done for others.
author: Mimir

quote: The mind, not the sword, wins the battle.
author: Kratos

quote: The greatest weapon in the fight against chaos is order.
author: Mimir

quote: Faye's spirit is a part of this world now. She can rest.
author: Kratos

quote: Only by facing your fears can you move past them.
author: Mimir

quote: To be effective in combat, one must be efficient with their energy.
author: Kratos

quote: To live a life of service is to fulfill the highest calling.
author: Mimir

quote: There are consequences to every action, no matter how small.
author: Kratos

quote: Life is about accepting the things you cannot change and changing the things you can.
author: Mimir

quote: No matter how great the loss, hope must remain.
author: Kratos

quote: Wisdom comes not from experience, but from reflection on experience.
author: Mimir

quote: It is the struggles we face that make us stronger.
author: Kratos

quote: To truly learn from a mistake, one must acknowledge and accept it.
author: Mimir

quote: There is no shame in asking for help when it is needed.
author: Kratos

quote: One must learn to control their emotions to become a master of combat.
author: Mimir

quote: One's legacy is defined by the impact they have on others.
author: Kratos

quote: I don't want to be the next Michael Jordan, I only want to be Kobe Bryant.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I create my own path. It was straight and narrow. I looked at it this way: you were either in my way, or out of it.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Everything negative - pressure, challenges - is all an opportunity for me to rise.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I'm reflective only in the sense that I learn to move forward. I reflect with a purpose.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: If you're afraid to fail, then you're probably going to fail.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: The beauty in being blessed with talent is rising above doubters to create a beautiful moment.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: The important thing is that your teammates have to know you're pulling for them and you really want them to be successful.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Pain doesn't tell you when you ought to stop. Pain is the little voice in your head that tries to hold you back because it knows if you continue you will change.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I can't relate to lazy people. We don't speak the same language. I don't understand you. I don't want to understand you.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I'm chasing perfection.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I'll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it's sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I'm not the most talented. I'm not the biggest. But I'm the best.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Being broke is a temporary situation. Being poor is a state of mind.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Broke people want to make money, wealthy people want to create value.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: When you're broke, you're always worried about money. When you're rich, you're always focused on opportunities.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The biggest difference between broke people and rich people is that rich people take action, while broke people make excuses.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Broke people think that having a job is the key to success. Rich people know that having a business is the key to success.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Broke people are always worried about the price. Wealthy people are always focused on the value.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Broke people complain about their situation. Rich people take action to change their situation.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Being broke is a choice. You can choose to take action and create wealth, or you can choose to make excuses and stay broke.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Broke people are always waiting for the perfect opportunity. Rich people know that there is no such thing as a perfect opportunity, and they take action anyway.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: If you want to be rich, you have to think like a rich person. Broke people think like broke people.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Broke people are always looking for the easy way out. Rich people know that there is no substitute for hard work and dedication.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: If you want to be rich, you have to be willing to take risks. Broke people are too afraid to take risks.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Broke people think that saving money is the key to wealth. Rich people know that investing money is the key to wealth.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The biggest mistake that broke people make is thinking that they don't have enough money to start a business. The truth is that you don't need a lot of money to start a business.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Broke people focus on the short term. Rich people focus on the long term.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The worst thing about being poor is that nobody will listen to you.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Being rich isn't about the money, it's about the freedom it provides.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Being poor is a state of mind. Poverty is a disease that can be cured with the right attitude.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The only thing that stands between you and wealth is the belief that you can't achieve it.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: You don't have to be born rich to become wealthy. You just have to be willing to work harder than anyone else.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: If you want to be rich, you have to think like a rich person. That means investing in yourself and your future.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Being poor is a choice. You can choose to stay where you are, or you can choose to change your life.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The key to getting rich is to focus on what you love and find a way to make money doing it.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Being poor is a temporary condition. Being broke is a mindset.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The biggest mistake people make is thinking that they have to be born wealthy to become rich. The truth is, anyone can become wealthy with the right mindset and work ethic.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: If you want to be rich, you have to be willing to take risks. That means stepping out of your comfort zone and trying new things.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Being rich isn't about having a lot of money. It's about having the freedom to do what you want, when you want.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: Being poor is not a curse. It's a wake-up call to take action and change your life.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: The road to riches is long and hard, but the rewards are worth it. Don't give up just because it's difficult.
author: Tristan Tate

quote: If you want to be wealthy, you have to be willing to invest in yourself. That means taking courses, reading books, and learning new skills.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Being rich is not just about money. It's about having the power to make a difference in the world.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Discipline equals freedom
author: Jocko Willick

quote: Good leaders don't tell people what to do, they show them how it's done
author: Jocko Willick

quote: If you want to change the world, start off by making your bed
author: Jocko Willick

quote: There are no bad teams, only bad leaders
author: Jocko Willick

quote: The most important conversation is the one you have with yourself
author: Jocko Willick

quote: Simplicity is the key to brilliance
author: Jocko Willick

quote: The only easy day was yesterday
author: Jocko Willick

quote: Good is not enough. You've got to be great
author: Jocko Willick

quote: Don't count on motivation. Count on discipline
author: Jocko Willick

quote: There is no substitute for hard work
author: Jocko Willick

quote: Stop researching every aspect of it and just do it. Plunge forward
author: Jocko Willick

quote: Take ownership of everything in your world. Take ownership of your mistakes, take ownership of your shortfalls, take ownership of your problems, and then take ownership of the solutions that will get those problems solved
author: Jocko Willick

quote: The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war
author: Jocko Willick

quote: Discipline starts every day when the first alarm clock goes off in the morning. I say 'first alarm clock' because I have three, as I was taught by one of the most feared and respected instructors in SEAL training, 'an officer waits for someone to tell him what to do; a leader just does it.'
author: Jocko Willick

quote: The ultimate task of the leader is to lead by example
author: Jocko Willick

quote: Cover and move. That's what we do. It's what we have always done
author: Jocko Willick

quote: If you allow failure to be an option, it will become your destination
author: Jocko Willick
